Body:
g = Grid(infile)
POINTS = 8
ref = np.ones(POINTS)
ref[4] = 1e-06
ref[5] = -1000000.0
assert_equal(g.grid.flat, ref)
assert_equal(g.grid.size, POINTS)
assert_equal(g.delta, np.ones(3))
assert_equal(g.origin, np.array([20.1, 3.0, -10.0]))
pytest.mark.parametrize('infile', [datafiles.DX, datafiles.DXGZ])
